articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK-U.S. High-level Talks
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK-U.S. High-level Talks

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK foreign ministry gave the following answer put by KCNA Thursday as regards the DPRK-U.S. high-level talks:
					
					 The second round of the high-level talks was held in Geneva, Switzerland on Monday and Tuesday between the DPRK delegation led by First Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Kye Gwan and the U.S. delegation led by Special Representative for DPRK Policy Stephen Bosworth.
					
					 The talks that took place in the wake of the previous ones held at the end of July helped deepen each other's understanding and made a series of progress.
					
					 Both sides decided to further DPRK-U.S. contacts and talks to discuss and solve the pending issues in the light of building confidence.
					
					 The DPRK side remains unchanged in its stand to resume the six-party talks at an early date without precondition to implement the September 19 joint statement for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula in a comprehensive and balanced manner on the principle of simultaneous actions.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Turkmenistan

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Turkmenian President Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov on its national day.
					
					 Kim in the message wished him success in his work for prosperity of the country and well-being of the people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Czech President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Czech President

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Vaclav Klaus, president of the Czech Republic, on Oct. 24 on its national day. 
					
					 In the message he extended congratulations to the Czech president and people.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Meets General Manager of Chinese Group Company
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Meets General Manager of Chinese Group Company

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim met and had a friendly talk with Yun Gongmin, general manager of the Hetian Group Company of China, and his party which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Minister of Electric Power Industry Ho Thaek, Minister of Coal Industry Kim Hyong Sik, General Manager of the Yonggwang Development General Company Sin Nam Chol and officials concerned and Wang Zhilin, councilor of commerce and trade of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets PM of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets PM of Czech Republic

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Choe Yong Rim Monday sent a message of greeting to Prime Minister Petr Necas of the Czech Republic on its national day.
					
					 The message wished him success in his work for development of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets PM of Saint Vincent and Grenadines
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets PM of Saint Vincent and Grenadines

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Ralph Gonsalves, prime minister of Saint Vincent and Grenadines, on the 32nd anniversary of its independence.
					
					 The message wished him success in his work for development of the country and promotion of people's well-being.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Czech Republic

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Karel Schwarzenberg, vice prime minister and foreign minister of the Czech Republic, on its national day.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets FM of Turkmenistan

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of greeting to Turkmenian Foreign Minister Rashid Meredov on its national day.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms.

articles.title: Event on Day of Germany Held
articles.content:
Event on Day of Germany Held 

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A cultural event on the day of Germany took place in Pyongyang on Thursday to mark the 10th anniversary of the opening of DPRK-Germany diplomatic relations.
					
					 Present there were So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Germany Friendship Association, and officials in the fields of science, education, culture and public health.
					
					 Ambassador Gerhard Thiedemann and officials of the German embassy here and German guests staying in the DPRK were on hand.
					
					 Speakers at the event referred to the exchange and cooperation in culture boosted between the two countries since the establishment of their diplomatic ties. They expressed belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would further develop in the field of culture.

articles.title: Program Contest and Exhibition Open
articles.content:
Program Contest and Exhibition Open

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The 22nd national program contest and exhibition were opened in the DPRK with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition Thursday.
					
					 Presented to the contest and exhibition are more than 1,500 application programs for Korean-style computer operation system developed by scientists, technicians and youth and students across the country. 
					
					 The programs are on display divided into 16 panels including operating system and security, artificial intelligence and image processing.
					
					 Among them are achievements the industrial establishments, ministries and national institutions have made in the course of raising the IT level of their units with their own efforts. Also there are programs presented by Three-Revolution team members and students of computer talents training centers across the country. 
					
					 During the contest and exhibition there will be contests of English-Korean translating program, program for computer simulation practice and other programs and exchange of information technology and service of programs. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Choe Hui Jong, department director of the C.C. WPK, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and programmers.
					
					 Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, addressed the ceremony. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the exhibition hall.

articles.title: Acrobatic Performance Given at Renovated Pyongyang Circus Theater
articles.content:
Acrobatic Performance Given at Renovated Pyongyang Circus Theater

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Circus Theater has been successfully renovated in the DPRK.
					
					 The project for renovating five main building blocks of the theater, including the stage and auditorium, was completed on a high level in a matter of less than one year so as to ensure aquatic, ice and other acrobatic performances in four seasons.
					
					 The artistes of Pyongyang Circus gave an acrobatic performance at the theater on Wednesday.
					
					 Appreciating it were Minister of Culture An Tong Chun, officials concerned, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the field of art education, soldier-builders and working people in the city.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers of diverse genres as physical stunts "Double Swing" and "Flying Girls", synchronizing swimming  "Centering on Water", jugglery "Girls Reflected in a Mirror", ice circus "Youths on Ice-Rink" and animal circus "Bear and Monkey".
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung 

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Foreigners staying in the DPRK Thursday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Among them were Yun Gongmin, general manager of the Hetian Group Company of China, and his party and a delegation of the Beijing Service Bureau for Diplomatic Missions of China led by Deputy Director-General Lu Huizao. 
					
					 The visitors made bows in humble reverence to the President.

articles.title: Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" Staged in Changchun
articles.content:
Opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" Staged in Changchun

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK staged the opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai" before full house in Changchun City, Jilin Province of China on Tuesday, the first leg of their performance tour of it.
					
					 Among the audience were Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China, Wang Rulin, governor of Jilin Province, officials in the field of culture and many other people.
					
					 At the end of the performance the audience vied with each other to congratulate the performers and give their impressions.
					
					 The secretary expressed belief that the performance would make a great contribution to the development of culture in the province.
					
					 The governor said that the artistes of the DPRK produced the opera with all sincerity, adding he was impressed to see the perfect combination of orchestral music, songs and pangchang (off-stage song), etc.
					
					  The director of the Department for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries of the Ministry of Culture noted that the performance is of great significance as it raised the curtain on the 61st anniversary of the Chinese People's Volunteers' entry into the Korean front.
					
					 It was thanks to the meticulous guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il that the opera was successfully produced, he stressed.
					
					 The manager of the Performance Co. Ltd. of the province said he did not imagine the performance mesmerized the audience so completely. Many performances have been given at this theatre so far but there has been no such uninterrupted enthusiastic applause as today, he added.
					
					 Xinhua news of China aired that the artistes of the DPRK excited the audience with delicate representation, beautiful words of songs and refined dancing, saying that not a few people watched the last scene of the opera with tears in their eyes.
					
					 Their performance will go on in various other cities.

articles.title: Art Exchange Brisk between DPRK, China
articles.content:
Art Exchange Brisk between DPRK, China

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Phibada Opera Troupe is making a performance tour of China with the opera "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai".
					
					 The opera, created by the troupe, is based on the Chinese folk tale criticizing the feudal status and marriage systems through the tragic love between an aristocrat's daughter and a scholar's son.
					
					 The art exchange between the DPRK and China has a long history.
					
					 The operas "The Flower Girl" and "A Dream of Red Mansions" serve as a symbol of the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 "The Flower Girl" was written by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and created as a revolutionary opera under the energetic guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The opera was performed in China in Juche 62 (1973) and again in 1998, enjoying a great popularity.
					
					 After ten years, the opera was good box office for the third time in China, highlighted by mass media.
					
					 The theme song of the opera is still popular among Chinese people.
					
					 The Chinese classic story "A Dream of Red Mansions" is well known to the Korean people.
					
					 When visiting China in 1961, President Kim Il Sung enjoyed a drama based on the story together with Chinese leaders and invited its performers to play it in the DPRK.
					
					 Later, he suggested adapting the story to a classic opera in Korea for the development of the traditional friendship between the DPRK and Chinese people.
					
					 The classical opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" was performed in Pyongyang in 1962.
					
					 After nearly half a century, leader Kim Jong Il guided the classical opera to be recreated as required by the new century, adding significance to the year 2009 marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and China.
					
					 The new opera was performed successfully in both Korea and China.

articles.title: South Hamgyong Province Witnesses Economic Upsurge
articles.content:
South Hamgyong Province Witnesses Economic Upsurge

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A fresh economic upsurge has been registered in South Hamgyong Province, the DPRK. 
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex has resumed operation after years of stagnation and taken on a new look as a gigantic vinalon fiber producer.
					
					 The complex updated the vertical spinning and fiber shops to turn out high-quality vinalon fiber.
					
					 The Hungnam Fertilizer Complex completed the first-stage gasification project for producing fertilizers with raw materials and fuel available in the country and successfully made its trial operation.
					
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex has manufactured modern geothermal equipment.
					
					 The Taehung Youth Hero Mine has reached a record high in ore production by employing a new open cast mining method. 
					
					 The mine has boosted the production of magnesite ores 2.2 times, magnesia clinker and high-quality magnesia clinker 2.5 times respectively and light burning magnesia 35 times, compared with the year Juche 91 (2002).
					
					 It has also started producing magnesia clinker and light burning magnesia without use of cokes.
					
					 The upsurge has also been reported from the Ryongyang Mine and the construction of the Tanchon Port.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il, in the name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, invited officials, innovators, scientists and technicians of the province to the capital city of Pyongyang in praise of their feats performed in putting their industrial establishments on a modern and scientific basis.

articles.title: Samjiyon Grand Monument
articles.content:
Samjiyon Grand Monument

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Grand Monument is in Ryanggang Province in the northern part of the DPRK.
					
					 The monument is based on the historic fact that President Kim Il Sung, heading the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in May Juche 28 (1939), advanced into the homeland to deal a heavy blow to the Japanese imperialist aggression forces and inspire local people with confidence in victory in the struggle for national liberation.
					
					 It provides visitors with a good understanding of the President's glorious revolutionary history and great feats in bringing the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle of the Korean people to victory.
					
					 The monument consists of the President's statue standing against the background of Mt. Paektu and Lake Samji and group sculptures "Motherland", "Camping", "Torch", "Reverence", "Advancement into Homeland" and "Water of Motherland".
					
					 Erected in May 1979, it has drawn millions of visitors, including overseas Koreans and foreigners.

articles.title: KCNA Detailed Report on Modernization of February 8 Vinalon Complex
articles.content:
KCNA Detailed Report on Modernization of February 8 Vinalon Complex 

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency issued a detailed report on the modernization of the February 8 Vinalon Complex on Wednesday. 
					
					 Noting that the complex built a modern vinalon factory last year bringing great pleasure to the whole country, the report added it successfully completed a huge project for increasing its capacity this year.
					
					 The report went on:
					
					 The vast projects including horizontal spinning process, the fiber production process and the leading process for the production of vinalon were completed in the main in a matter of one and half years to mass-produce quality Juche fiber. 
					
					 The process for turning out vinalon intermediate products was rounded off and there appeared processes for the production of caustic soda and vinyl chloride and dyestuffs-agrochemicals. As a result, it turned into a huge modern and comprehensive chemical producer having inorganic and organic, high polymer and precision organic chemistry. 
					
					 A dramatic change in the vinalon industry is the shining fruition of the wise leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea and the drive of the working people in South Hamgyong Province who regard the party's decision as immutable truth and devotedly implement it. 
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il's field guidance to the complex in the hottest period of summer in 2007 marked an event of historic turning point as it injected energy into the Juche vinalon industry. 
					
					 An all-out drive was waged to update the processes of vinalon intermediate products and on this basis newly build processes for the production of vinalon and chemical products at the complex which had been at standstill during the Arduous March, forced march. 
					
					 The updating of the processes for vinalon intermediate products including aldehyde, acetic acid and plasticizer processes was completed in a matter of a little over six months. 
					
					 The vinalon production process, which would have taken more than a decade, was newly built on the basis of latest science and technology in a matter of two years. It again began the vinalon production from February of 2010, 16 years later. 
					
					 In the wake of the completion of the modern vinalon factory last year, the complex kicked off another all-out drive to increase the production capacity while hastening the vinalon production since March last year. 
					
					 The production capacity of horizontal spinning process is several times higher than that of the already completed vertical spinning process. The complex built a horizontal spinning process and the production process of short fiber and pushed ahead with the project for rounding off the leading vinalon production processes including Korean-style cyclic boiler, air-tight carbide electric furnace and the rod-coal production process. 
					
					 The old production sites covering a large area are no longer to be seen and there appeared instead the horizontal spinning shop and fiber shop production processes and buildings.
					
					 There also sprang up cyclic boilers which no longer require complicated pulverizing system and ensure high combustion efficiency under any fuel conditions.
					
					 The construction of the air-tight carbide electric furnace, the production process of rod-coal and the lime kiln went full steam ahead. Successes were made in the researches to update overall production processes including the improvement of the quality of vinalon at a high level. 
					
					 Rapid progress made in the construction of settling ponds helped satisfactorily solve the issue of industrial water. 
					
					 These signal changes prove that the potential of the self-supporting socialist economy is tremendous and the building of an economic power is sure to succeed despite all the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and the ideal of its people to come true.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Torch Lit in South Hamgyong Province Flare up
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Torch Lit in South Hamgyong Province Flare up

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a political essay Wednesday called upon all the people to wage a nationwide labor drive, holding high the torch lit in South Hamgyong Province on the east coast of Korea.
					
					 The essay explains what happened in the province and how it became the torch of the era.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The coal gasification project was completed at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex to mass-produce fertilizer.
					
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex succeeded in manufacturing geothermal equipment by its efforts in a matter of 135 days,
					
					 A horizontal spinning process was completed at the February 8 Vinalon Complex and went operational.
					
					 A leaping advance was again made at the Taehung Mine and the Ryongyang Mine and the appearance of Tanchon area has changed beyond recognition.
					
					 The progress made in South Hamgyong Province means that of the nation's industry and development of the country.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province admirably responded to the call of the party and country in a timely and crucial historic period.
					
					 What did breathe a new life into the province where factories had been at standstill due to the snowstorm of the Arduous March and made the hearts of the workers with a heroic history behind burn with strong determination.
					
					 It was the torch of victory lit by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It was in that province that Kim Jong Il made the forced march in the sweltering mid-summer heat and by driving his car at the top speed along the road wet with rain.
					
					 It was there that he was so pleased with the success made in the production of steel without using coke that he paid tribute to workers before a chart for visual aid. It was again in that province that Kim Jong Il, destiny of the country, wore a safety helmet and went down twice to the pit where water was dropping from its ceiling.
					
					 The people of the province with pure and strong hearts were united to uphold Kim Jong Il, launching an indefatigable labor drive. This developed into raging flames hotter than lava. This unusual loyalty and the inexhaustible might of single-minded unity of the population of the province stirred up the whole country in October.
					
					 The centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, a great auspicious event in the nation's history, is close at hand.
					
					 Let's fling open at a breath the gate to victory in the spirit, work style and fighting traits of the people of the above-said province!
					
					 This is the call of the party and country.
					
					 This is the response of all the people to emerge victorious as befitting the descendants of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 The people of South Hamgyong Province never yield to any trial but make persevering efforts to unconditionally carry out whatever difficult work. This spirit and executive ability are their traits and mettle.
					
					 They demonstrated in practice that Korea does what it determines to do and proved that this represents the national identity and traits of Koreans.
					
					 The DPRK is on the track of sure victory and even this hour witnesses fresh fruits of creativity and prosperity.
					
					 It will steadily advance and always emerge victorious according to its timetable no matter what difficulties lie before it.
					
					 Let the flames in the province flare up with greater force!

articles.title: Independent Person Elected as Mayor of Seoul in S. Korea
articles.content:
Independent Person Elected as Mayor of Seoul in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A by-election to local self-governing bodies took place in south Korea on Wednesday.
					
					 The focus of it was on the election of mayor in Seoul which is inhabited with the majority of the population.
					
					 On the votes counted, Pak Won Sun, an independent candidate, won in the election, defeating Ra Kyong Won, candidate from the "Grand National Party".  
					
					  The results of the recent election meant a stern punishment of the conservative forces by the public.

articles.title: Pro-Americanism of S. Korean Foreign Ministry Flayed
articles.content:
Pro-Americanism of S. Korean Foreign Ministry Flayed

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A deputy spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea released a commentary censuring the puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade for its irresponsible attitude on Tuesday.
					
					 The ministry was revealed to have refused to examine the content of "bill on implementation of the Free Trade Agreement" passed through U.S. Congress, the commentary noted.
					
					 It is self-evident that south Korea will suffer from the FTA in case south Korea's "motion calling for ratification of it" is different from the U.S. bill after the motion is passed through the "National Assembly", it stated.
					
					 The ministry, however, claimed that it would examine the U.S. bill after the NA ratification, it charged, adding: Growing is criticism that the ministry is made up of pro-American elements.

articles.title: Book "President Kim Il Sung and Koreans in Japan" Published by Chongryon
articles.content:
Book "President Kim Il Sung and Koreans in Japan" Published by Chongryon

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) published a book "President Kim Il Sung and Koreans in Japan" in commemoration of the centenary of birth of the President.
					
					 It carries a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 It also edits pictures of the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il receiving Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan who visited the socialist homeland.
					
					 It consists of 10 chapters including chapters "As a model of overseas Koreans' organizations in the era of independence", "Bringing the national education into full bloom", "Long voyage in the East Sea of Korea associated with loving care", "Profound trust and warm benevolence", and "For national reunification and international solidarity."
					
					 Each chapter has sub-titles.
					
					 The book tells stories that the President met delegations and visiting groups of Chongryon and its officials, intellectuals, workers in commerce and persons of culture, sportspersons, youth and students who visited the socialist homeland and Koreans in Japan who lead a happy life under the care of the homeland and had photos taken with them.
					
					 It also related stories about the efforts exerted by the President all his life for the development of Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan, his precious instructions and warm loving care shown by him for the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It reflects the firm faith and will of Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan to hold the President in high esteem forever and make a dynamic advance for the development of Chongryon and national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Principled Stand Supported in France, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Principled Stand Supported in France, Nigeria

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A French organization and a Nigerian personage made public statements on Oct. 21, as regards the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave answers to questions put by ITAR-TASS of Russia.
					
					 In his answers Kim Jong Il clarified the clear stands toward the prospect of development of the traditional DPRK-Russia relations, the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and the six-party talks, relationship with the U.S. and Japan and other matters, the France-Korea Friendship Association in its statement noted, adding:
					
					 The progressive forces in France and the world peace-loving forces extend full support to the DPRK's principled stand to resume the six-party talks at an early date without preconditions and realize the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula on the principle of simultaneous action.
					
					 M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his statement praised Kim Jong Il as the genius of diplomacy who has steadily developed the friendly relations among countries with his energetic external activities.
					
					 He is defender of justice and peace, creator of happiness and father of all people, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Russian Magazine Introduces Machine Complex of DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Magazine Introduces Machine Complex of DPRK 

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Rivu Zurnal, an Internet magazine of Russia, on Oct. 16 introduced the Ryongsong Machine Complex of the DPRK under the headline of "Inheriting the traditional spirit of self-reliance".
					
					 The magazine said in an article:
					
					 The complex has achieved great successes in updating the production processes and technique in keeping with the requirements of the IT age. It perfected a new casting process for production of ordered equipment and settled the knotty technical problems arising in assembling equipment for production processes.
					
					 It installed molding assembly lines to suite its specific conditions and put the casting process on a CNC basis.
					
					 The workers of the complex, which had honor of being visited by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, registered signal success in manufacturing the important ordered equipment needed for gasification project at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 They had made great contributions to manufacturing large-size equipment for the country in the past.
					
					 They are now working miracles in production of ordered equipment, inheriting the tradition of the spirit of self-reliance.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepali Figure
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepali Figure

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A Nepali newspaper on Oct. 21 carried a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and a notes of travel in the DPRK by Ram K. Karmacharya, chairman of the Study and Research Forum of Songun Politics of the National Press Club of Nepal.
					
					 The chairman said in his travel notes that the world never knows such a leader as Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of the President the DPRK worked remarkable changes and miracles and emerged a military power, he noted, adding:
					
					 Such monumental edifices as Pyongyang Metro could be built only in the DPRK.
					
					 The recent visit to the DPRK once again drove home to me the fact that the DPRK today would have been unthinkable without the immortal exploits of the President.
					
					 The International Friendship Exhibition House intensively shows the high authority of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and great history of modern Korea.
					
					 The U.S. armed spy ship "Pueblo" at the side of the River Taedong in Pyongyang made us know well about the spirit and tremendous military power of the DPRK undeterred by the pressure of the imperialists. 
					
					 We were impressed by the spirit of the Korean people who are making a signal progress while defending the country from the imperialists' moves for aggression.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean PM Hopes for Development of Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean PM Hopes for Development of Relations with DPRK

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Equatorial Guinea hopes that the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK would develop in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too, Prime Minister Ignacio Milan Tang said on October 21 when meeting with outgoing DPRK Ambassador to his country Kim Chun Bong.
					
					 These relations are a traditional relationship provided by the historic meetings between President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo and President Kim Il Sung, he said, adding:
					
					 We are satisfied to see the bilateral relations developing on good terms still now under the care of state leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: Chinese Official Urges Training of Cultural Talents
articles.content:
Chinese Official Urges Training of Cultural Talents

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- Li Yuanchao, head of the Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), on Monday called for training talents needed for the building of a cultural power.   
					
					 Speaking at the 33rd session of the central group for training of talents, he said that talents play a key role in promoting a great development and prosperity of socialist culture.       
					
					 He also underscored the need to deeply study the spirit of the 6th Plenary Session of the 17th CPC Central Committee and fully carrying out the tasks for training cultural talents.

articles.title: China to Promote Development of Socialist Culture
articles.content:
China to Promote Development of Socialist Culture

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- The 15th Session of the 11th Standing Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) was opened in Beijing recently.
					
					 The session will discuss studying and implementing the spirit of the Sixth Plenum of the 17th Central Committee of the C.C., the Communist Party, invigorating the cultural system reform and promoting a great development and prosperity of socialist culture.
					
					 Addressing the opening session, Jia Qinglin, chairman of the National Committee of CPPCC, said promoting a great development and prosperity of socialist culture is what CPPCC has to undertake.

articles.title: China Willing to Develop Friendship with Developing Nations
articles.content:
China Willing to Develop Friendship with Developing Nations

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- Liu Yunshan, head of the Publicity Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, recently clarified the country's stand to strengthen friendship and cooperation with developing nations.
					
					 Speaking at a meeting with participants in a seminar of information ministers of developing nations in Beijing, Liu said to develop friendship and cooperation with developing nations is a basis of the country's foreign policy and its long-term and steadfast strategic choice.
					
					 China is willing to boost cooperation and expand exchange with developing nations in the information field, he added.

articles.title: Chinese Official Calls for Studying Spirit of Party Plenum
articles.content:
Chinese Official Calls for Studying Spirit of Party Plenum

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- Liu Yunshan, head of the Publicity Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China (CPC), called for deeply studying and introducing the spirit of the Sixth Plenum of the 17th CPC Central Committee with emphasis put on improving public understanding of and confidence in culture. 
					
					 During a recent inspection tour of Hunan Province, Liu said it is necessary to unify the people's idea and action with the spirit of the plenum. 
					
					 He urged mobilizing all publicity media to explain the spirit of the plenum.

articles.title: Museum of Science and Technology Opens to Public in China
articles.content:
Museum of Science and Technology Opens to Public in China

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- A museum of science and technology opened to the public in Qinghai Province, China, on October 24.
					
					 The museum is located at Xining City of the Province with its total plottage of 33,179 square meters and all the data on science and technology.

articles.title: China's Cooperation with African Countries
articles.content:
China's Cooperation with African Countries

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- China and Botswana agreed to further strengthen the mutual cooperation in promoting economic growth, maintaining stability and other fields on Monday.
					
					 On the same day China and Gabon vowed to enhance bilateral military ties.

articles.title: Environmental Protection in China
articles.content:
Environmental Protection in China 

					 Beijing, October 26 (KCNA) -- Liaoning Province of China is exerting big efforts for the protection of ecological environment.
					
					 It plans to build more than three thousand facilities for environmental protection including the sewage treatment plants in five years to come.

articles.title: Russia Chides West's Wrong Attitude
articles.content:
Russia Chides West's Wrong Attitude 

					 Moscow, October 26 (KCNA) -- Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov at a recent press interview scathingly accused the West of its unreasonable attitude.
					
					 Recalling that the West worked out a list of some Russians on whom it wants to slap sanctions over the death of a lawyer during preliminary investigation in Russia, he dismissed the list as one not worth even a slight argument.
					
					 He said that the West tries to replace Russia in deciding who is to blame, adding no one has the right to make a decision or impose it on Russia by replacing the Russian judicial system.
					
					The Russian judicial system alone can make such judgment, he stressed.

articles.title: Coexistence of Different Races Is Russia's Treasure: President
articles.content:
Coexistence of Different Races Is Russia's Treasure: President

					 Moscow, October 26 (KCNA) -- Russian President Dmitri Medvedev said the cultural experience of Russia made up of 180 races and the experience of their coexistence are Russia's treasure.
					
					 Speaking at a meeting with students in Moscow on October 20, the president said only when different races live together in Russia, can the country be a strong nation in the world.

articles.title: Cristina Fernandez Reelected President of Argentina
articles.content:
Cristina Fernandez Reelected President of Argentina

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was reelected as president of Argentina. 
					
					 She won the support from the majority of voters in the recent presidential election, reported the state-run TV on Sunday.

articles.title: Iran Warns against U.S. Potential Sanctions
articles.content:
Iran Warns against U.S. Potential Sanctions

					 Tehran, October 26 (KCNA) -- Iran on Monday warned against potential U.S. sanctions against the country and called on the European Union and other countries to adopt independent approach toward the Islamic Republic.
					
					 U.S. officials said that the U.S. was working with its partners to impose comprehensive sanctions on Iran, including sanctions on the Central Bank of Iran over the alleged Iran's involvement in a plot of assassinating the Saudi envoy to the United State.
					
					 According to the local satellite Press TV, Larijani said if the United States generates trouble for Iran, it will certainly prove costly for Washington.
					
					 Referring to the U.S. allegations, he said it is very clear that American officials have always pursued antagonistic policies towards Iran.
					
					 He urged regional countries to be cautious about the U.S. plots which are aimed at sowing discord among th

articles.title: Pakistani Lawmaker Rejects UN Report on Iran
articles.content:
Pakistani Lawmaker Rejects UN Report on Iran

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Senator Syed Tahir Hussain Mashhadi of Pakistan on Monday strongly rejected a United Nations report on human rights in Iran.
					
					 The UN special rapporteur has alleged in a report that human rights violations have increased in Iran.
					
					 The senator branded the report as an incredible and baseless one.
					
					 He referred to Iran as a democratic country where people were free to express their opinion. 
					
					 The political was of the view that UN has always towed U.S. policy and the dictation of U.S. was obvious in making of Shaheed's report.

articles.title: A NATO Soldier Killed by Explosion in Afghanistan
articles.content:
A NATO Soldier Killed by Explosion in Afghanistan 

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A soldier with the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force was killed by an Improvised Explosive Device explosion in Afghanistan on Monday, a press release of the alliance said. 
					
					 So far this year, 493 NATO soldiers with 371 of them Americans have been killed in Afghanistan.

articles.title: One Student Shot, Wounded at NC High School in U.S.
articles.content:
One Student Shot, Wounded at NC High School in U.S.

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- A teen girl was shot and wounded Monday in a high school shooting in the U.S. state of North Carolina, local media reported.

articles.title: Bulgaria Seizes 12.56 Kg of Heroin
articles.content:
Bulgaria Seizes 12.56 Kg of Heroin

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian customs have seized 12.56 kg of heroin at Kapitan Andreevo checkpoint near the country's southeastern border with Turkey, officials said here on Monday.

articles.title: Vast Majority of Americans Discontent with Wall Street
articles.content:
Vast Majority of Americans Discontent with Wall Street

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Vast majority of Americans are dissatisfied with the Wall Street, a new national poll showed Monday.
					
					 Eight in 10 of those surveyed say Wall Street bankers are greedy, 77 percent say they're overpaid, and two-thirds say they are dishonest, according to the CNN/ORC International poll.

articles.title: Earthquake Damage Expands in Turkey
articles.content:
Earthquake Damage Expands in Turkey

					 Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The damage done by earthquake that hit Turkey on Oct. 23 is expanding.
					
					  As of Tuesday, the death toll increased to 366 and the number of the wounded to more than 1,300. This is the worst quake in the last decade, said NTV broadcasting service of the country.

articles.title: MINREX se refiere al resultado de conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX se refiere al resultado de conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU.

					　Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 27 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC con respecto a la realizacion de las conversaciones de alto rango RPDC-EE.UU. 
					
					　Tuvo lugar los dias 24 y 25 en Ginebra, Suiza, la segunda ronda de las conversaciones de alto rango entre la delegacion coreana encabezada por el primer vicecanciller Kim Kye Gwan y la delegacion estadounidense presidida por el delegado especial para la politica sobre la RPDC, Bosworth.
					
					　En la presente cita, efectuada despues de la primera ronda realizada a finales de julio pasado, se ha profundizado el entendimiento sobre la posicion de ambas partes y logrado una serie de avance. 
					
					　Ambas partes acordaron continuar los contactos y conversaciones RPDC-EE.UU. para discutir y solucionar los problemas pendientes con vistas a crear la confianza mutua. 
					
					　Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de reanudar inmediata e incondicionalmente las conversaciones a 6 bandas y ejecutar de modo global y equilibrado a base del principio de accion simultanea la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre para la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim felicita a Ralph Gonsalves
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim felicita a Ralph Gonsalves

					　Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim envio el dia 27 un mensaje a su homologo de San Vicente y Granadinas, Ralph Gonsalves, para felicitarle por el 32o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					
					  El remitente desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo para el desarrollo del pais y el fomento de bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Inaugurado 22o concurso-exposicion nacional de programas
articles.content:
Inaugurado 22o concurso-exposicion nacional de programas

					　Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 27 en la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones el 22o Concurso-Exposicion Nacional de Programas.
					
					　En el certamen se han presentado mas de mil 500 programas de aplicacion para el OS coreano desarrollados por los cientificos, tecnicos y jovenes estudiantes de distintas localidades del pais. 
					
					　Los programas se exhibieron divididos en 16 secciones como la de OS y de seguridad, la de inteligencia artificial y de procesamiento de imagenes, etc.
					
					　Figuran los exitos logrados por su propia cuenta por las fabricas, empresas, ministerios y organos centrales para elevar el nivel de informatica, y los programas presentados por los miembros de los grupos por las tres revoluciones y los estudiantes talentosos de los planteles docentes ciberneticos. 
					
					　En el marco del certamen se realizaran los concursos de programa de traduccion ingles-coreano, el de experimentos de ensayo por computadora y otros programas, el intercambio de IT y el servicio de programas de aplicacion.
					
					　Participaron en la ceremonia de apertura el vicepremier Ro Tu Chol, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Choe Hui Jong, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Yong Jin, el presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Jang Chol, y otros funcionarios junto con los inventores de programas.
					
					　El presidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas, Ri Ja Bang, pronuncio el discurso de apertura.
					
					　Terminado el acto, los participantes vieron los programas exhibidos.

articles.title: Acto cultural por el Dia de Alemania
articles.content:
Acto cultural por el Dia de Alemania 

					　Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en esta capital el acto cultural para el dia de Alemania con motivo del 10o aniversario del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Federal de Alemania.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Alemania So Ho Won y los funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y salud publica.
					
					  Alli participaron el embajador Gerhard Thiedemann, los miembros de la sede diplomatica alemana en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					  Los oradores se refirieron a que despues del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas, se activan el intercambio y la cooperacion en la rama cultural y expresaron la conviccion de que se fortaleceran las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Informacion sobre modernizacion de Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
articles.content:
Informacion sobre modernizacion de Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero 

					　Pyongyang, 27 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo publicada el dia 26 la informacion detallada de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) sobre la modernizacion del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero. 
					
					　El ano pasado, ese complejo trajo un gran jubilo al levantar la moderna fabrica de Vinalon y este ano cumplio exitosamente la enorme obra de ampliacion de capacidad. 
					
					　Durante un ano y medio se han construido fundamentalmente el proceso de hilado horizontal, el de produccion de fibra y los procesos avanzados de produccion de vinalon y se produce mucho mas la fibra de buena calidad. 
					
					　Se han perfeccionado el proceso productivo de productos intermedios de vinalon, el de hidroxido de sodio y cloruro de vinilo, y el de colorante-productos agroquimicos. De esta manera, el complejo se ha convertido en el moderno combinado quimico dotado de la quimica inorganica, la organica, la macromolecular y la organica de precision. 
					
					　Tales transformaciones de la industria de vinalon resultan fruto de la sabia guia del gran partido y de las llamas de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur que materializa a cabalidad la decision del partido. 
					
					　La visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, realizada en la estacion canicular del 96 (2007) de la Era Juche, fue un motivo historico que estimulo la industria de vinalon al estilo coreano. 
					
					　El complejo, que habia parado su funcionamiento en el periodo de la marcha penosa, la forzada, libro la ofensiva general para modernizar los procesos de produccion de productos intermedios de vinalon y construir nuevamente los de vinalon y de otros articulos quimicos.  
					
					  Ha terminado en medio ano y pico la modernizacion de los procesos productivos de productos intermedios de vinalon incluso los procesos de aldehido, acido acetico y plastificante. 
					
					  Ademas, durante dos anos se ha renovado en el nivel sofisticado el proceso de produccion de vinalon, obra que requeria mas de 10 anos, y desde febrero de 2010, o sea, a los 16 anos, empezo otra vez la produccion de vinalon. 
					
					　Desde marzo del ano pasado, despues de la inauguracion de la moderna fabrica de vinalon, el complejo volvio a entrar en la ofensiva general para acelerar la produccion y ampliar mas la capacidad productiva. 
					
					  Se han construido el proceso de hilado horizontal y el de produccion de fibra corta e impulsado las obras para perfeccionar los procesos avanzados de produccion de vinalon como caldera de fluidez circulatoria y el horno electrico de carburo de calcio. 
					
					  En la vasta area del complejo desaparecieron viejas bases de produccion y se levantaron por doquier los edificios y los procesos productivos del taller de hilado horizontal y el de fibra. 
					
					  Se levantaron sucesivamente las calderas de fluidez circulatoria con alta eficiencia termica. 
					
					  Se alcanzaron exitos en la investigacion para obtener el alto nivel modernizado de los procesos productivos en su conjunto. 
					
					  Gracias a la obra de deposito de sedimentacion, se ha resuelto satisfactoriamente el problema de aguas industriales. 
					
					  Tales transformaciones orgullosas comprueban que son inagotables las potencialidades de la economia independiente socialista, que triunfa la construccion de la potencia economica, y que se realiza sin falta el ideal del pueblo.
